Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kedzie/71st
ShortDescription: Northbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 71st, California, Marquette and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 71st, California, Marquette and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/71st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
